CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1952, pg. 7, reads: "Church of God in Christ Damaged by Fire - Following the evening service recently the First Church of God in Christ was damaged by fire, thought to be from a makeshift flue, The building was so badly damaged that it had to be razed.  Plans are being made to build a new edifice on the same lot, according to Elder William Green, paster of the church."
TitMainTitle: Man wearing light colored overcoat, holding book, and standing in Church of God in Christ with severe fire damage to wooden ceiling
